alert.note: Alert for Madison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 3:56AM CDT until June 15 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN LEAKE...SOUTHERN ATTALA AND NORTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 356 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Singleton, or 9 miles south of Kosciusko, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Renfroe and Zama around 405 AM CDT. Edinburg around 415 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
